definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: It was only the die-hards who stayed to see the end of the poor movie.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些死硬派纔有本事把這部爛片看完。

sentences.english: There were plenty of terrible movies in 2009, but only one can be the terriblest.
sentences.chinese: 2009年有很多爛片，但最爛的只有一部。

sentences.english: Taht movie was for the birds. why does Hollywood continue to produce such trash?
sentences.chinese: 那電影太傻了，好萊塢爲什麼一直拍這些爛片呢？

sentences.english: Juliet chose not to see the bad movie.
sentences.chinese: 朱麗葉選擇不看那部爛片。

definition: third category movie (containing sexual or violent content)
not much to choose between the two/tweedledum and tweedledee
Brokeback Mountain, 2005 English-language film by Ang Lee 李安[Li3 An1]
photo taken during a theatrical production/a still (from a movie)
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
